2+1.sig_info: Once per fight, Goldpool gains Regeneration, recovering 98 to 293.89 Health over 8 seconds. If this ability is suppressed by a Skill Champion, Goldpool reaches into his script code and tries once more to activate it after 2 seconds. Mutant beats Trained...I mean...Skill

LAND 20 HITS WITHOUT BEING STRUCK: Goldpool’s confidence soars and he begins throwing out childish barbs to annoy his opponent, inflicting a Taunt passive on them for 10 seconds, reducing their Attack Rating by 35%. Childish!? Hey! Words hurt!
WHEN BROUGHT BELOW 15% MAX HEALTH: Once per fight, Goldpool has a 999% chance to gain Regeneration, recovering 245 Health over 8 seconds. Leave my Regen alone Black Widow! You too Crossbones!
HEAVY ATTACKS: A boot to the face is always funny, and allows Goldpool to refresh a personal Taunt effect. Pow! Right in the...well...
BLEED EFFECTS: Goldpool’s accelerated healing factor reduces the damage of incoming Bleed effects by 20%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 1: 65% chance to Stun the opponent for 2 seconds. Against Non-Robot Male Champions, this chance is doubled. Cup Check!
SPECIAL ATTACK 2: If Goldpool completes his dance after this attack he gains Prowess, increasing Special Attack damage by 100% for 40 seconds. If he is interrupted he instead gains 25% Power. Dance break!
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 140.25 direct damage over 5.50 seconds. This Bleed is affected by Prowess Buffs.
25% chance to Stun the opponent for 3 seconds. The first time this attack is used each fight, the chance is 100%.
SPECIAL ATTACK 3: Goldpool receives a call from the game devs, and then annoys them into Refreshing his Prowess and Regeneration Buffs.
100% chance to inflict Bleed, dealing 229.5 direct damage over 4.50 seconds. This Bleed is affected by Prowess Buffs.

6+1.sig_info: Once per fight, Goldpool gains Regeneration, recovering 2320.34 to 6966.41 Health over 8 seconds. If this ability is suppressed by a Skill Champion, Goldpool reaches into his script code and tries once more to activate it after 2 seconds. Mutant beats Trained...I mean...Skill
